languages.text: {n}На стол перед вами ложится рапорт. Соломон, прочистив горло, сухо произносит:{/n} "Я, Соломон Антар, официально прошу освободить меня от должности в свите Вольного Торговца в связи с тем, что я не оправдал оказанное мне высокое доверие".

{n}A report lies on the desk in front of you. Solomorne, clearing his throat, speaks dryly,{/n} "I, Solomorne Anthar, formally request to be relieved of my position in the Rogue Trader's retinue due to my failure to live up to the high trust placed in me."
languages.original_text: {n}На стол перед вами ложится рапорт. Соломон, прочистив горло, сухо произносит:{/n} "Я, Соломон Антар, официально прошу освободить меня от должности в свите Вольного Торговца в связи с тем, что я не оправдал оказанное мне высокое доверие".

traits.locale_text: {n}A report lies on the desk in front of you. Solomorne, clearing his throat, speaks dryly,{/n} "I, Solomorne Anthar, formally request to be relieved of my position in the Rogue Trader's retinue due to my failure to live up to the high trust placed in me."

{n}A report lies on the desk in front of you. Solomorne, clearing his throat, speaks dryly,{/n} "I, Solomorne Anthar, formally request to be relieved of my position in the Rogue Trader's retinue due to my failure to live up to the high trust placed in me."

{n}A report lies on the desk in front of you. Solomorne, clearing his throat, speaks dryly,{/n} "I, Solomorne Anthar, formally request to be relieved of my position in the Rogue Trader's retinue due to my failure to live up to the high trust placed in me."

{n}A report lies on the desk in front of you. Solomorne, clearing his throat, speaks dryly,{/n} "I, Solomorne Anthar, formally request to be relieved of my position in the Rogue Trader's retinue due to my failure to live up to the high trust placed in me."

{n}A report lies on the desk in front of you. Solomorne, clearing his throat, speaks dryly,{/n} "I, Solomorne Anthar, formally request to be relieved of my position in the Rogue Trader's retinue due to my failure to live up to the high trust placed in me."

languages.text: {n}Un rapport est posé sur le bureau devant vous. Solomorne se racle la gorge et déclare sans émotion :{/n} « Moi, Solomorne Anthar, demande officiellement à être démis de mon poste dans l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, car je n'ai pas su me montrer à la hauteur de la confiance qui m'avait été accordée. »
languages.original_text: {n}A report lies on the desk in front of you. Solomorne, clearing his throat, speaks dryly,{/n} "I, Solomorne Anthar, formally request to be relieved of my position in the Rogue Trader's retinue due to my failure to live up to the high trust placed in me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un rapport est posé sur le bureau devant vous. Solomorne se racle la gorge et déclare sans émotion :{/n} « Moi, Solomorne Anthar, demande officiellement à être démis de mon poste dans l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, car je n'ai pas su me montrer à la hauteur de la confiance qui m'avait été accordée. »

languages.text: {n}あなたの前にある机の上に報告書が置かれている。ソロモーンは咳払いをひとつし、乾いた口調で言った。{/n}「私、ソロモーン・アンサールは、自らに寄せられた厚い信頼に応えることができなかった責任を取り、ローグトレーダー従者の任を正式に辞したく、ここに申し出ます」
languages.original_text: {n}A report lies on the desk in front of you. Solomorne, clearing his throat, speaks dryly,{/n} "I, Solomorne Anthar, formally request to be relieved of my position in the Rogue Trader's retinue due to my failure to live up to the high trust placed in me."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの前にある机の上に報告書が置かれている。ソロモーンは咳払いをひとつし、乾いた口調で言った。{/n}「私、ソロモーン・アンサールは、自らに寄せられた厚い信頼に応えることができなかった責任を取り、ローグトレーダー従者の任を正式に辞したく、ここに申し出ます」

languages.text: {n}Tienes delante un informe, colocado sobre tu mesa. Solomorne carraspea y empieza a hablar:{/n} «Yo, Solomorne Anthar, solicito formalmente que se me releve del cargo en el séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, dado que no he podido estar a la altura de la confianza depositada en mí».
languages.original_text: {n}A report lies on the desk in front of you. Solomorne, clearing his throat, speaks dryly,{/n} "I, Solomorne Anthar, formally request to be relieved of my position in the Rogue Trader's retinue due to my failure to live up to the high trust placed in me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tienes delante un informe, colocado sobre tu mesa. Solomorne carraspea y empieza a hablar:{/n} «Yo, Solomorne Anthar, solicito formalmente que se me releve del cargo en el séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, dado que no he podido estar a la altura de la confianza depositada en mí».

languages.text: {n}你面前的桌子上摆着一份报告。索罗蒙清了清嗓子，以干巴巴的声音开了口。{/n}“我，索罗蒙·安萨，辜负了行商浪人对我的高度信任。我在此正式请求解除我在行商浪人手下的职务。”
languages.original_text: {n}A report lies on the desk in front of you. Solomorne, clearing his throat, speaks dryly,{/n} "I, Solomorne Anthar, formally request to be relieved of my position in the Rogue Trader's retinue due to my failure to live up to the high trust placed in me."

traits.locale_text: {n}你面前的桌子上摆着一份报告。索罗蒙清了清嗓子，以干巴巴的声音开了口。{/n}“我，索罗蒙·安萨，辜负了行商浪人对我的高度信任。我在此正式请求解除我在行商浪人手下的职务。”

languages.text: {n}Önündeki masada bir rapor duruyor. Solomorne, boğazını temizleyip kuru bir sesle söz alıyor.{/n} "Ben ki Solomorne Anthar, şahsıma duyulan güveni boşa çıkardığım için Hür Tacir'in maiyetindeki görevimden affımı arz ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}A report lies on the desk in front of you. Solomorne, clearing his throat, speaks dryly,{/n} "I, Solomorne Anthar, formally request to be relieved of my position in the Rogue Trader's retinue due to my failure to live up to the high trust placed in me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Önündeki masada bir rapor duruyor. Solomorne, boğazını temizleyip kuru bir sesle söz alıyor.{/n} "Ben, Solomorne Anthar, şahsıma duyulan güveni boşa çıkardığım için Hür Tacir maiyetindeki görevimden affımı arz ediyorum."

languages.text: {n}Auf dem Schreibtisch vor dir liegt ein Bericht. Solomorne räuspert sich und erklärt:{/n} "Ich, Solomorne Anthar, bitte formell um meine Entlassung von meiner Position im Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, da ich den in mich gesetzten Erwartungen nicht entsprochen habe."
languages.original_text: {n}A report lies on the desk in front of you. Solomorne, clearing his throat, speaks dryly,{/n} "I, Solomorne Anthar, formally request to be relieved of my position in the Rogue Trader's retinue due to my failure to live up to the high trust placed in me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Auf dem Schreibtisch vor dir liegt ein Bericht. Solomorne räuspert sich und erklärt:{/n} "Ich, Solomorne Anthar, bitte formell um meine Entlassung von meiner Position im Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, da ich den in mich gesetzten Erwartungen nicht entsprochen habe."
